argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | qusring.u | |- U = ( R /s ( R ~QG S ) ) |
| 2 |  | qusring.i | |- I = ( 2Ideal ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` R ) = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_qus1 | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. I ) -> ( U e. Ring /\ [ ( 1r ` R ) ] ( R ~QG S ) = ( 1r ` U ) ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_simpld | |- ( ( R e. Ring /\ S e. I ) -> U e. Ring ) |
